SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis
Package Server.Connections

Class GeneralServerConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
Server.Connections.GeneralServerConnectionHandler
public class GeneralServerConnectionHandler extends Object
This class is the endpoint for managing the connections to the clients. It works by creating a ServerConnectionHandlerSOCKET and a ServerConnectionHandlerRMI and using their methods. It also holds a map between player ids and names and a list of disconnected ids.

    • getServerConnectionHandler

      public ServerConnectionHandler getServerConnectionHandler(String id) throws PlayerNotInAnyServerConnectionHandlerException
      Returns the server connection handler corresponding to the specific client's connection mode
      Parameters:
      id - the client's id
      Returns:
      the appropriate server connection handler
      Throws:
      PlayerNotInAnyServerConnectionHandlerException - if the player is not found in any server connection handler (i.e. the player is not connected)

    • getServerConnectionHandlerRMI

      public ServerConnectionHandlerRMI getServerConnectionHandlerRMI()

      the socket connection handler
